title: What is Identity and Access Management?
text:
Source: Authentication and Authorization

What is Identity and Access Management?



identity and Access Management.









If you need this
Use this




Provide identity and access management for employees in a cloud or hybrid environment.
Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)


Collaborate with guest users and external business partners like suppliers and vendors.
Azure AD Business to Business (B2B)


Control how customers sign up, sign in, and manage their profiles when they use your applications.
Azure AD Business to Consumer (B2C)

title: Follow the Zero Trust Guidelines
text:
Source: Authentication and Authorization

Follow the Zero Trust Guidelines



Zero Trust Guidelines.

title: When to use Azure Active Directory?
text:
Source: Authentication and Authorization

When to use Azure Active Directory?
Azure AD is the Azure solution for identity and access management. Azure AD is a multitenant, cloud-based directory, and identity management service.



Azure Active Directory.



Centralize identity management.
establish a single Azure AD instance.
Use Azure AD Connect, or AD Connect cloud sync for hybrid identity sync.
